data.text: @BobMcCa26974838 Early to mid 80's, all of it in Navy Band New Orleans. The Navy school of music was in Norfolk, VA., so we were fairly close!😃
@HillbillyHighl1 What years did you serve? I was on an LST out of Little Creek, Va from 88-92. If we even remotely served together, I’ll be inviting myself for a visit…!!! Love these posts…!!!
